snippet: Citizens are stepping forward in favor of comprehensive legislation that would include a quick and direct path to citizenship for 11 million people living in the country illegally.
abstract: Citizens are stepping forward in favor of comprehensive legislation that would include quick and direct path to citizenship for 11 million people living in United States illegally; advocates lobbying in Washington are calling on senators who are writing legislation to present bill soon.
lead_paragraph: Citizens are stepping forward in favor of comprehensive legislation that would include a quick and direct path to citizenship for 11 million people living in the country illegally.

headline.main: U.S. Citizens Join Illegal Immigrants in Pressing Lawmakers for Change
headline.print_headline: U.S. Citizens Join Illegal Immigrants In Pressing Lawmakers for Change
